Fortunately , weight loss little 5-7 % baseline body weight improve risk chronic disease . An effective behaviorally-based , lifestyle intervention deliver via internet develop University Vermont . Therefore overall goal project pilot test proven distantly- delivered behavioral weight loss intervention among overweight breast cancer survivor evaluate whether resistance program result improvement lean body mass , study intervention change insulin sensitivity . Specifically , project randomize , control clinical trial design test effectiveness acceptability 6-month behavioral weight loss intervention without resistance training . Participants randomize one two group : 1 ) behavioral weight control treatment via Internet ; 2 ) behavioral weight control treatment via Internet plus resistance training program . Assessments conduct baseline six month include measure body weight , muscle mass , adherence treatment , insulin sensitivity .
